attributes.name: slice
attributes.description:
Defines the name of data slice in DCE where the data from `value` will be propagated on `change` or by `slice-event` event

On: any component with `value` and associated change event

attributes.name: slice-event
attributes.description:
Defines the event name on which `value` would be synchronized with DCE slice

On: any component with `value` and associated change event

attributes.name: custom-validity
attributes.description: XPath expression to return either boolean or error string to be shown by browser native UI on form validation event. Unless value is true, prevents the form submission.

attributes.name: slice-value
attributes.description: XPath expression to populate into the slice

elements.name: custom-element
elements.description: Declarative Custom Element as W3C proposal PoC with native(XSLT) based templating

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: hides DCE definition to prevent visual appearance of content. Wrap the payload into template tag to prevent applying the inline CSS in global scope.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: HTML tag for Custom Element. Used for window.customElements.define(). If not set, would be generated and DCE instance rendered inline.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: full, relative, or hash URL to DCE template.

events.name: value:changed
events.description: Emitted when data changes. Can be used for state serialization in hydration flow

properties.name: value
properties.description: DCE state. Can be used for state serialization in hydration flow. Format TBD, most likely encoded XML string

elements.name: for-each
elements.description: The <xsl:for-each> element selects a set of nodes and processes each of them in the same way. It is often used to iterate through a set of nodes or to change the current node. If one or more <xsl:sort> elements appear as the children of this element, sorting occurs before processing. Otherwise, nodes are processed in document order.

attributes.name: select
attributes.description: Uses an XPath expression to select nodes to be processed.

elements.name: location-element
elements.description: get/set window URL parts or from SRC URL

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: url to be parsed. When omitted window.location is used.

attributes.name: live
attributes.description: monitors history change, applicable only when href is omitted.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: when defined, changes URL by one of predefined methods.

elements.name: slice
elements.description: Synthetic element for defining the slice-attributed when more then one slice/event/value associated with parent element
